frame.name: System
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Complex</fen> with a particular <fen>Function</fen> is formed out of <fen>Component_entities</fen>. The function may be expressed by reference to a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> involved in the working of the <fen>Complex</fen>.
<ex><fex name="pos">The body's</fex> <fex name="fun">immune</fex> <fex name="plx"><t>system</t></fex> can be mobilized against cancer. </ex>
<ex>The <fex name="com">sewer</fex> <fex name="plx"><t>system</t></fex> carries wastewater from homes and businesses to the Water Pollution Control Plant for treatment. </ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Component_entities
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entities that function together as a unit.
<ex>The people of Bangkok had the opportunity to experience the long awaited underground <fex name="com">train</fex> <t>system</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Complex
FE.definition:
<def-root>The unit formed by the <fen>Component_entities</fen>.
<ex>The DeKalb County School <fex name="plx"><t>System</t></fex> cordially invites you to attend the Ground Breaking Ceremony for Peachtree Middle School.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Function
FE.definition:
<def-root>The activity that the <fen>Complex</fen> entity performs by virtue of its <fen>Component_entities</fen> interacting.
<ex>These cells form part of the <fex name="fun">immune</fex> <t>system</t> and help to prevent the body from getting diseases .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any characterization or evaluation of the <fen>Complex</fen>.
<ex>Kwame Kilpatrick is taking a hard look at Detroit's <fex name="des">highly inefficient</fex> bus <t>system</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Possessor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A person or organization that possesses or owns the <fen>Complex</fen> or a larger entity of which the <fen>Complex</fen> itself is a part.
<ex><fex name="pos">China's</fex> transportation <t>system</t> has undergone profound changes in recent years.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The kind of entity that the <fen>Complex</fen> operates on as part of its <fen>Function</fen>.
<ex>The lifespan of a central <fex name="sal">sewage</fex> <t>system</t> is about 80 years.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: system.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a complex whole; a set of things working together as a mechanism or interconnecting network.

lexUnit.name: complex.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an interlinked system; a network.

lexUnit.name: cascade.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a succession of devices or stages in a process, each of which triggers or initiates the next.
